DIA_Boles_FIRSTWARN_03_02: There is a charge for passing through here. Any form is accepted, could be gold, could be decent beer.
DIA_Boles_SECONDWARN_03_01: I'm warning you! One more step and you'll regret it!
DIA_Boles_SQ206_GiveBeer_03_02: Thank you very much, you may pass.
DIA_Boles_SQ206_Know_15_01: You know how few people walk this way anyway?
DIA_Boles_SQ206_Know_03_02: What? I met you here, so there'll probably be others.
DIA_Boles_SQ206_Know_15_03: Probably only if they get lost. Most go through the vineyard area because it's faster there.
DIA_Boles_SQ206_Know_03_04: The vineyard area you say? Hm, maybe it's worth considering...
DIA_Boles_SQ206_Know_03_06: Okay, I'll check that area out. Thanks for the idea!
DIA_Boles_SQ206_Better_15_01: Don't you have something better to do?
DIA_Boles_SQ206_Better_03_02: Young man, you gotta make a living somehow. You probably don't worry about it yet, but like everyone else at that age, you spend your days partying and looking for a girl.
DIA_Boles_SQ206_Better_03_04: Yeah, sure. Having fun, partying, bragging about how you'll single-handedly defeat a bridge troll, while in reality it's a real job you haven't experienced.
DIA_Boles_SQ206_Better_15_05: There are no trolls like that... Anyway, never mind.
DIA_Boles_SQ206_NiceVineyard_03_01: Well, it's nice here. I'll have to look around very carefully.
DIA_Boles_SQ206_AfterQuest_03_01: Well, kid, your advice turned out to be very good. I made a deal with Rita, she let me stay.
DIA_Boles_SQ206_AfterQuest_03_02: Ah, praise Innos that constant quality control is needed when making wine!
DIA_Boles_SQ206_AfterQuest_15_03: For you, it's probably a dream job.
DIA_Boles_SQ206_AfterQuest_03_04: Yes, I can drink... I mean taste, as much as I need to! And more! Here, try this. I guarantee you won't regret it! I'll go back to work myself!
